title: Consider the Source
text: When gathering information, it's important to consider the credibility and reliability of the source. Academic sources are often peer-reviewed, ensuring accuracy and quality.

title: What is Peer Review?
text: Peer review is a process where experts in the field evaluate the quality and validity of a research paper before it is published. This ensures the information is credible.

title: Identify Reliable Sources
text: Which of the following is a reliable method to gather information for a college research paper?
choices: Using personal blogs as primary sources.
